alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 4:33PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN CHEYENNE...KIMBALL... SOUTHERN BANNER AND EASTERN LARAMIE COUNTIES... At 432 PM MST...A snow squall was along a line extending from 6 miles west of Hillsdale to near Dix...and moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and visibilities less than one half mile. SOURCE...Radar and Webcams. IMPACT...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick roads and low visibilities. Locations impacted include... Kimball, Pine Bluffs, Burns, Dix, Albin, Oliver Campground, Hillsdale, Panorama Point, Oliver Reservoir, Kimball Airport, Gun Barrel, Carpenter, Harrisburg, Ranchettes and Bushnell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 369 and 402. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 1 and 34. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Expect rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Motorists are urged to use extreme caution if traveling through these areas!

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
